betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oBlood Magic is a mod based on sacrifices and demonic powers.

It provides many useful tools in the form of rituals and sigils. It interacts with Thaumcraft to provide a simple way to clear Flux.

The mod is quite friendly to automation, and a few custom multiblocks here will supply or upgrade some of its features.

The quests here will walk you through the mod and its addons Blood Arsenal and Animus.
